## EnvironmentConfiguration.pnpmVerifyStoreIntegrity property

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

If specified, enables or disables integrity verification of the pnpm store during install. See 

**Signature:**

```typescript
static get pnpmVerifyStoreIntegrity(): boolean | undefined;
```
